data.title: Great Food at a Reasonable Price
data.text: A friend suggested we visit the restaurant for lunch.  She said they had fantastic burgers.  I ordered a hodgepodge burger which had a little of everything--four different kinds of cheese,bacon, guacamole, mushrooms, onions.lettuce, tomato and other things.  My wife ordered the crunchy burger which had deep fried onion rings on top of it.  Both burgers had a great taste and the total bill for us came to a little over $14.00 including tax.  Chips were included with the burger.

data.title: Best burger EVER!
data.text: This place is where you want to go for a good, no GREAT burger.  Always full of people, which is a good sign.  Cash only!

data.title: Great burger and onion rings
data.text: Burgess Grill is a great place for lunch Lawton.  The chicken fried steak and burgers are super.  We have eaten there many times and it is best to come early or after about 12:15. They have a good lunch business from local businesses and the courthouse.

data.title: Excellent grilled foods
data.text: Burgess Grill is a Lawton institution. Go early for lunch and have one of the best cheese burgers in Oklahoma; they also have pie. I have tried several dishes, all are good with excellent portions.

data.title: Good place for lunch
data.text:
They only serve lunch Monday through Friday 10Am to 4PM. Most customers are local and work in the down town area.
They have call in for carry out.
I love the regular hamburger. The chicken meal and roast beef meals were good.
They have home made pie but I try to resist the temptation.

data.title: The burgers are very good-huge
data.text: I hadn't been to the Burgess Grill in a while and honestly couldn't remember the name. But, I remembered that to had had a really good burger there. So,  while visiting relatives, all I had to say was remember that place near the mall that has good burgers? They knew exactly where to take me.  The burgers are big, freshly prepared, delicious, and did I SAY BIG?  The menu gives you many burger options plus other home cooked items.  My cousin had the chicken fried steak.  I had to take a taste- really good.  I had the mushroom burger with Swiss cheese.  I added grilled onions. My husband had the Mexican burger with fresh guacamole.  He enjoyed it very much As did I.  And yes, they only take cash.  Word to the wise.

data.title: Anyone who considers himself to be a burger aficianado should make a pilgrimage to the Burgess Grill
data.text: The Burgess Grill has been serving great food for years in Lawton. The burgers are the specialty of the house. They come large with a variety of toppings alongots with quality sides, like curly fries, tater tots and others. The grill is only open for lunch and is a "cash only" establishment.

data.title: Overrated, Overpriced, and Overcooked!
data.text: I asked the waitress to tell me what was good on the menu. She replied, "We are famous for our hamburgers." I had read that this restaurant specialized in hamburgers. A sign at the front said that the plce was one of the top 10 hamburger places in the state. After waiting over 20 minutes for my meal, I will say that the food was not worth the wait. I can name 10 fast food places that cook better hamburgers. This was my first and definitely my last time at the Burgess Grill.

data.title: Decent food only cash
data.text: The cash only is stamped on the back not widely published upon walking in. The food was good I had the crunchy burger. Nice onion rings and like the horseradish sauce. Service was horrible. Having to flag the waitress down if anything was needed. I wouldn't return

data.title: Great Hamburgers!
data.text: We were in town for my sons graduation from basic training. The one thing he wanted was a good hamburger. We read the reviews and this seemed to be the place. The hamburgers were huge and delicious. They have many different types of hamburgers to choose from. Be aware this place only accepts cash! Appeared that the locals like to hang out at this place. It's an older restaurant, but the food was great. The owner came over and thanked my son for his service to our country and have him a free piece of coconut pie. My son said it was delicious. I would go back for another hamburger if I were ever in Lawton again.

data.title: Great Burgers ... be aware that this is a "cash only" business
data.text:
I visited friends in Lawton the end of last week and they took me to the Burgess Grill.  I've been going to and through Lawton for 31 years and had never heard of it!  So it was a great surprise to discover a local burger place that cooks burgers to order so they arrive hot and delicious.  No precooked, microwaved junk here!

And the prices are great.  Bacon Cheesburger for about $5.65.  I had onion rings with it that were very good, my friends had fries that were hot and not greasy.

Be aware that this is a Cash Only business, so forget checks and credit cards.

It's also very close to the courthouse, so fills up quickly during the lunch hour.

OH:  they have a fairly large menu, not just burgers, so something for everyone.

data.title: Hidden gem in Lawton
data.text: This is our favorite burger place in Lawton. The flame burger is my fav but they have many other delicious choice as well. We just wish they had dinner hours and breakfast everyday. :-) they make a delicious breakfast as well!

data.title: The best hamburger in town. Even the bun is warmed on the grill.
data.text: Love your burger?  The best in town is Burgess burgers. They hae a good price on food and it is homemade! Love their pies, too.

data.title: Hometown favorite
data.text: Burgess Grill has been around for as long as I can remember.  Get here early if you plan on eating at noon.  Fills up fast.  The burgers are awesome and the buns are hot!!!  Very reasonably priced!!

data.title: Good Food!
data.text: Wife and I enjoy getting away for lunch at this nice little restaurant at least a couple times a month. Food is always good and reasonably priced for portion size. A truly great lunch date location.

data.title: Gotta try it!
data.text: Local icon AND great food.  I always am torn between a burger with avocado or the daily hot special.   Now for the real reason, homemade pie and onion rings.

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: We ate at Burgess's because of their great burgers and we were not dissapointed. They were very good and reasonable priced. We even had french fries with brown gravey which is one of my favorties.

data.title: Old-times are good.
data.text: Best old-fashioned burger I have had in several years. Grilled buns,hand-made patty, and the bacon-burger was loaded with bacon. Plus, the waitresses still call you honey and darling. A throw back to a better time for us.

data.title: AWESOME ONION BURGERS!
data.text: Whenever I return to Lawton for a visit, I love to go to Burgess Grill for one of their AWESOME ONION BURGERS.  A delicious all beef burger patty topped with caramelized onions.  Just one bite takes me back 50 years as I once again enjoy one of my favorites as a teen growing up in Lawton.  If you've never had an onion burger at Burgess Grill, give it a try; or if onions are not your thing, choose from their nostalgic menu which offers an array of the many succulent items found in the great American Diners.

data.title: It's Ok
data.text: I stopped in here for lunch and tried there hamburger steak with mashed potatoes and white gravy along with their green beans. It was all good except for the green beans, they were a strange bright green color and had no taste. They could do better than that.
